mapper.select: select b.board_no as no, b.title, b.created_date createdDate, count(file_no) fileCount, m.member_no, m.name from boards b left outer join board_files bf on b.board_no=bf.board_no inner join members m on b.writer=m.member_no where b.category=#{value} group by board_no order by board_no desc
